channel.title: Home on Status Artis Construction
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Status Artis Construction

item.title: House Construction
item.description: At Status Artis we offer comprehensive services of design, supervision and construction of turnkey houses. We create constructions with high aesthetics, functional spaces and mainly energy autonomy. We are particularly focused on low energy footprint buildings, proposing and implementing the most modern energy saving solutions. In the context of our cooperation with you: We present you alternative proposals in 3D for your new property and we modify them according to your needs and desires.

item.title: House and business space renovations
item.description: At Status Artis we undertake all types of renovation and renovation of homes and business spaces. We have perfectly coordinated workshops in order to complete the work in the shortest possible time. This is also the most important issue in the renovations, taking into account your needs for the short reopening of the space to be renovated. In the context of our cooperation with you: We first capture your space and discuss your needs and desires together.

item.title: Energy upgrade of buildings
item.description: By upgrading the energy of a building, the quality of life of the tenants is improved, the heating and cooling costs are minimized and the damage to the building is reduced. At Status Artis we apply thermal insulation techniques of buildings based on Scandinavian standards with the aim of zero energy consumption. To upgrade the energy class of a building, you need: Thermal insulation of the roof. It is the most important thermal insulation of the building.

item.title: Solving building problems
item.description: To successfully deal with a building problem, the exact location of the real source of the problem is paramount. At Status Artis, during our operation in Sweden, we have invested in a number of measuring and detection instruments, so that we can successfully undertake the final solution of building problems such as: Moisture and mold Water inflows inside the house Cracks from earthquakes Damage to the outside of the building Hydraulic leaks Electrical problems Noise pollution Our company undertakes insulation, waterproofing, building reinforcement, thermal insulation, thermal facade, repair of plumbing and electrical installations and sound insulation.

item.title: Custom designs
item.description: At Status Artis we have precision cutting machines (fiber laser and CNC router) for wood, plastic and metal, for the creation of special constructions (furniture, railings, partitions, metal facades of buildings, etc.) that give a unique character to each space.

item.title: New blog posts coming soon!
item.description: Here we will post new blog articles on construction techniques and more. Stay tuned!

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: We will be very happy to meet you up close, to discuss your needs and to suggest you the best possible solutions. In order to better serve you, we can make telephone appointments to meet you at the place of your preference. It goes without saying that you are always welcome in our offices, at the address below.

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Last Updated On 02-Apr-2022 Effective Date 02-Apr-2022 This Privacy Policy describes the policies of Status Artis Construction, Aristotelous 28 Kounoupidiana, Chania, Chania Crete 73100, Greece, phone: 2821 40 4444 on the collection, use and disclosure of your information that we collect when you use our website ( statusartis.gr ). (the “Service”). By accessing or using the Service, you are consenting to the collection, use and disclosure of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
